tool_description: Manages internal agent notes, collaboration comments, and private documentation throughout the ticket lifecycle.

agent_id.description: ID of agent adding the note

note_type.description: Type of note (progress, research, collaboration, escalation, resolution)

visibility.description: Who can see this note (agent, team, department, all)

action_required.description: Whether this note requires action from others

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Agent not found: The provided agent_id does not exist.
Invalid note type: Use one of [progress, research, collaboration, escalation, resolution].
Empty note: Note content cannot be empty.
Invalid visibility: Use one of [agent, team, department, all].
Permission denied: Agent does not have permission to add notes to this ticket.
usage: Add internal notes to tickets for documentation, collaboration, and knowledge sharing. Set appropriate visibility levels and action flags.

note_sequence.description: Sequential number of this note for the ticket

visibility_level.description: Confirmed visibility level for the note

action_flag.description: Whether action is required from other team members
